name: LucasPresidentFacts
0:
”Alexa, open presidential facts”
”Alexa, start presidential facts”
”Alexa, ask presidential facts for a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: presidential facts
des:
Ask Alexa for an interesting list of facts about your topic of choice. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next fact. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer. A fun presidential skill from Johnston Community College
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
